name: Planet Repair Squad
description:
Humans are exhausting the resources on Earth. As a member of the alien Planet Repair Squad, it is time you go fix it!

Fly over the planet, abduct animals, trees, fishes. Move them to other places to prevent them from being killed by factories. Get rid of greenhouse gas in outer space (or anything else you don't like). Help the planet to sustain its ecosystems for as many years as possible.

Keyboard: arrow keys or WASD

Gamepad: D-Pad (move), A (abduct), B (expell)

Touch: buttons will show up on screen

Made by Juan Patricio Di Bacco and Gilles Pommereuil

Engine: microstudio.dev
